text: Tini chaya dine asamanasamuha o yamina srsti karechena; tarapara tini â€˜arasera upara uthechena. Tini janena ya kichu yamine prabesa kare ebam ya kichu ta theke bera haya, ara asamana theke ya kichu abatirna haya ebam tate ya kichu ukhita haya [1]. Ara tomara yekhane'i thaka na kena--tini tomadera sange achena, ara tomara ya kichu kara allaha tara samyaka drasta
